sp_description.message: Discover web pages similar to the page you're currently browsing.

sp_chrome_special_case_text.message:
This extension works best on home pages or the main page of most websites.

Try the extension on a website you already love—test drive it and see the page suggestions on something you know.

sp_chrome_https_case_text.message: This extension can not make suggestions from pages like this which have secure content (e.g. https://). See you back on the public web!

sp_tld_special_case_text.message: The extension is currently not available for your country/region. Please check here again soon.

sp_domain_message.message: The extension will contact $1 to retrieve the list of similar pages.

sp_domain_change_message.message: To change your local domain to www.google.com, click here.

sp_domain_clicked_message.message: www.google.com has been saved as your local domain for retrieving similar pages.

sp_options_intro.message: The Google Similar Pages browser extension allows you to quickly preview and explore other pages that are similar to the one you are browsing --  on the fly!

sp_options_legal.message:
When you click the Similar Pages button, your browser will send a search query to Google to see if there are any similar pages for the page you are viewing.

The data related to the query will be handled as described in Google's privacy policy

sp_options_feedback.message: We'd love to hear any feedback you have at similarpages-extension@google.com. Thanks!

sp_options_uninstall_message.message: To uninstall Google Similar Pages, use Chrome's Tools > Extensions menu option, and click on the Uninstall link for the Google Similar Pages extension.
